51  // class introduction in obutil.cpp
52  class OBAPI OBStopwatch
53  {
54 #if HAVE_CLOCK_T
55  clock_t start;
56  clock_t stop;
57 #else
58  timeval start;
59  timeval stop;
60 #endif
61 
62  public:
63 #if HAVE_CLOCK_T
64 
66  void Start()
67  {
68  start= clock();
69  }
71  double Lap()
72  {
73  stop= clock();
74  return((stop - start) / (double) CLOCKS_PER_SEC);
75  }
76 #else
77  void Start()
79  {
80  gettimeofday(&start, NULL);
81  }
83  double Lap()
84  {
85  gettimeofday(&stop, NULL);
86  return((stop.tv_sec - start.tv_sec)
87  + (stop.tv_usec - start.tv_usec)/1000000.0);
88  }
89 #endif
90 
92  double Elapsed()
93  {
94  return(Lap());
95  }
96  };
97 
98 
101  class OBAPI OBSqrtTbl
102  {
103  double _max,_incr,*_tbl;
104  public:
105  OBSqrtTbl():
106  _max(0.0), _incr(0.0), _tbl(NULL)
107  { }
112  OBSqrtTbl(const double max, const double incr):
113  _max(max*max), _incr(incr), _tbl(NULL)
114  {
115  Init(max,incr);
116  }
117  ~OBSqrtTbl()
118  {
119  if (_tbl)
120  {
121  delete [] _tbl;
122  _tbl = NULL;
123  }
124  }
127  double Sqrt(double d2) const
128  {
129  if (_tbl)
130  return((d2 < _max) ? _tbl[static_cast<int>(d2*_incr)]:sqrt(d2));
131  else
132  return 0.0;
133  }
137  void Init(double max,double incr)
138  {
139  // parameters are potentially unneeded, but let's do this until we can
140  // deprecate them
141  _max = max * max;
142  _incr = incr;
143 
144  //array size needs to be large enough to account for fp error
145  int i;
146  double r;
147  _tbl = new double [static_cast<int>((_max/_incr)+10)];
148  for (r = (_incr/2.0),i=0;r <= _max;r += _incr,++i)
149  _tbl[i] = sqrt(r);
150 
151  _incr = 1/_incr;
152  }
153  };

163  OBAPI double calc_rms(double*,double*,unsigned int);

182  OBAPI bool OBCompareInt(const int &a,const int &b);
185  OBAPI bool OBCompareUnsigned(const unsigned int &a,const unsigned int &b);
192  OBAPI bool IsNear(const double &, const double &, const double epsilon=2e-6);
199  OBAPI bool IsNearZero(const double &, const double epsilon=2e-6);
200  OBAPI bool IsNan(const double &);
207  OBAPI inline bool IsNegligible(const double & a, const double & b,
208  const double precision = 1e-11)
209  {
210  return( fabs(a) <= precision * fabs(b) );
211  }
229  OBAPI inline bool IsApprox(const double & a, const double & b,
230  const double precision = 1e-11)
231  {
232  return( fabs(a - b) <= precision * std::min<const double>( fabs(a), fabs(b) ) );
233  }
235  OBAPI inline bool IsApprox_pos(const double &a, const double &b,
236  const double precision = 1e-11)
237  {
238  return( fabs(a - b) <= precision * std::min<const double>( a, b ) );
239  }
243  OBAPI bool CanBeSquared(const double &);
244 
245  OBAPI bool SafeOpen(std::ifstream &fs, const char *filename);
246  OBAPI bool SafeOpen(std::ofstream &fs, const char *filename);
247 #endif

250  //******************triple template*************************
253  template <class T1, class T2, class T3>
254  struct triple
255  {
256  //type names for the values
257  typedef T1 first_type;
258  typedef T2 second_type;
259  typedef T3 third_type;
260 
261  //member
262  T1 first;
263  T2 second;
264  T3 third;
265 
269  triple():
270  first(T1()),second(T2()),third(T3())
271  {}
272 
274  triple(const T1 &a, const T2 &b, const T3 &c):
275  first(a), second(b), third(c)
276  {}
277 
279  template<class U, class V, class W>
280  triple(const triple<U,V,W> &t):
281  first(t.first), second(t.second), third(t.third)
282  {}
283 
284  };
285 
286  //**************quad template********************
289  template <class T1, class T2, class T3, class T4>
290  struct quad
291  {
292  //type names for the values
293  typedef T1 first_type;
294  typedef T2 second_type;
295  typedef T3 third_type;
296  typedef T4 fourth_type;
297 
298  //member
299  T1 first;
300  T2 second;
301  T3 third;
302  T4 fourth;
303 
307  quad():
308  first(T1()),second(T2()),third(T3()),fourth(T4())
309  {}
310 
312  quad(const T1 &a, const T2 &b, const T3 &c, const T4 &d):
313  first(a), second(b), third(c), fourth(d)
314  {}
315 
317  template<class U, class V, class W, class X>
318  quad(const quad<U,V,W,X> &q):
319  first(q.first), second(q.second), third(q.third), fourth(q.fourth)
320  {}
321 
322  };
323 
324 } // end namespace OpenBabel
